org.springframework.data.mapping.context

类 PersistentEntities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.mapping.context.PersistentEntities
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterable<PersistentEntity<?,? extends PersistentProperty<?>>>, org.springframework.data.util.Streamable<PersistentEntity<?,? extends PersistentProperty<?>>>

    public class PersistentEntities
extends Object
implements org.springframework.data.util.Streamable<PersistentEntity<?,? extends PersistentProperty<?>>>
    Value object to access PersistentEntity instances managed by MappingContexts.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.8

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PersistentEntities(Iterable<? extends MappingContext<?,?>> contexts)
      Creates a new PersistentEntities for the given MappingContexts.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PersistentEntities

        public PersistentEntities(Iterable<? extends MappingContext<?,?>> contexts)
        Creates a new PersistentEntities for the given MappingContexts.
        参数:
        contexts -

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPersistentEntity

        public Optional<PersistentEntity<?,? extends PersistentProperty<?>>> getPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
        Returns the PersistentEntity for the given type. Will consider all MappingContexts registered but return Optional#empty() in case none of the registered ones already have a PersistentEntity registered for the given type.
        参数:
        type - can be null.
        返回:

      • getRequiredPersistentEntity

        public PersistentEntity<?,? extends PersistentProperty<?>> getRequiredPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
        Returns the PersistentEntity for the given type. Will consider all MappingContexts registered but throw an IllegalArgumentException in case none of the registered ones already have a PersistentEntity registered for the given type.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentEntity for the given domain type.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - in case no PersistentEntity can be found for the given type.

      • getManagedTypes

        public org.springframework.data.util.Streamable<org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?>> getManagedTypes()
        Returns all TypeInformation exposed by the registered MappingContexts.
        返回:

      • iterator
